entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
